headline: A Kennedy Moment, And a Card Unshown
abstract: Perhaps he couldn’t quite match Michael Jordan’s résumé, but Bryant managed to create — and make good on — a mystique of his own.
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant believed it on the day he was drafted into the N.B.A. as a 17-year-old in 1996. He made sure the scribes who watched him score 27 points in his first summer league game with the Los Angeles Lakers knew he believed it, too.
